name: S.C.I.: Special Criminal Investigation
description:
S.C.I.: Special Criminal Investigation is an action, shooter and racing game. It was originally released in 1989.
S.C.I.: Special Criminal Investigation is available on Wii, SEGA Master System, Atari ST and Commodore / Amiga.
It was produced by Iku Mizutani and Nick Cook. Tetsuya Shinoda directed the game. It was scored by Hiroyuki Iwatsuki, Iku Mizutani, Iku Mizutani (NES) and Takami Asano.
